description: This is an Android Kotlin fragment class that displays a list of notes, allows searching through them, and handles navigation to add or edit notes. It manages UI components such as RecyclerView, SearchView, and FloatingActionButton, and interacts with a ViewModel for data fetching and filtering.

classes.name: NotesListFragment
classes.description: A Fragment class responsible for displaying and managing a list of notes with search and navigation functionalities.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter inner class that binds Note data to list items and handles click events.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.NoteViewHolder
classes.description: A ViewHolder class that holds references to UI elements within each note list item and binds Note data.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout, initializes UI components, and sets up event listeners for search and navigation.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up observation on the notes LiveData and triggers initial data fetch.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set and refreshes the list display.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates ViewHolder instances for RecyclerView items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds Note data to the UI elements within a ViewHolder.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of notes in the list.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object to UI elements within the ViewHolder.
